data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhou, Yong, Merkl, Otto, Chen, Bin (2014): Notes on the genus Xenocerogria (Coleoptera, Tenebrionidae, Lagriini) from China. ZooKeys 451: 93-108, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.451.8478, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.451.8478
